Description: Role and Responsibilities·      Be part of the Corporate Social Responsibility program for NEOM, creating strategic partnerships for SR.·     Manage interactions and workflow with SR stakeholders and liaise with external and internal stakeholders.·      Lead engagements, communications, and partnerships with stakeholders and ensures timely completion of SR programs.·       Develop marketing material, developing websites, and managing social media channels and media campaigns for SR programs.·      Create awareness campaigns internally with key Sector Heads and communicating them externally.·      Provide regular reports and statistics on the progress of the projects, partnerships, and cases they handle.·       Work on and maintain excellent relationship with the related partners and stakeholders related to SR programs.·       Keep the department head informed of general and specific aspects relevant to the relationships with partners.·       Keep record and history of NEOM’s interactions with the all partners & stakeholders related to SR.·       Observe, advise, and guide representatives of other Departments in their relationship with key partners makes appropriate recommendation whenever applicable.·       Prepare presentations for the department’s management.·       Implement improvements in the internal department processes.·       Participate in projects and initiatives beyond the day-to-day operational tasks and guidelines related to SR department.·       Participate in the departments strategic planning. KNOWLEDGE, SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE·       Experience in building partnerships.·       Ability to work effectively in both informal and highly official settings.·       Excellent interpersonal and communication skills.·       Knowledgeable of Government stakeholder management.·       Knowledgeable of Saudi and Middle Eastern culture and history.·       Fluent in both written and spoken English and Arabic.·       High standard of integrity and character.·       Ability to work under pressure.Job Details
